title: Baixue Gongzhu Zhi Airen Liliang
synopsis: The news that Snow White is still alive and living a happy life with the prince spread like wildfire. It spread to the ears of the evil queen. The queen who wanted to eradicate Snow White was so angry that she found the fire wizard. Conspiracy, trying to kill Snow White again. 　　 One day, Snow White and the prince received a message from the dwarf who invited them to a party. However, it was the queen herself who sent the message. Unknowingly, Snow White and the prince came to the meeting place and were attacked by the enemy. In the end, the prince was captured and taken prisoner, while Snow White fell into the waterfall in an accident. Fortunately, Snow White got the help of the dwarf. She decided to cooperate with the dwarf and embark on a journey to rescue the prince. In the end, can Snow White expose the queen's conspiracy and successfully rescue her sweetheart? (translated from douban)
